Hello, I am very sorry for the inconvenience. You can try to update the software
Manual Upgrade Steps:
1. Ensure SIMSONN Manager is the latest version: First, make sure SIMSONN Manager is updated to version 2.0.6 Then, press the "Upgrade Button" on the main control board to enter upgrade mode.
2. Reconnect USB: Unplug the current USB connection and reconnect the USB cable to ensure the device is properly reconnected, and the pedals enter upgrade mode.
3. Manually select the firmware for upgrade: In the update interface, click the "Manual Update" button. For ProX models, select the prox.sfu firmware file from the pedals directory and click "Start Upgrade."
4. Wait for the upgrade to complete: Please wait patiently for the upgrade to finish. During the process, the pedal’s LED will turn off, indicating that the light upgrade is in progress.
5. Post-upgrade action: After the upgrade is complete, the LED will display the boot-up animation, indicating the upgrade was successful. At this point, manually release the "Upgrade Button."
6. Restore to normal working mode: Finally, unplug and reconnect the USB, and the device will return to normal working mode, completing the upgrade.

________________________________
support@simsonn.com
